00026 class Selection
00027 {
00028     typedef std::map<util::istring, unsigned short> MapType;
00029     MapType ent_map;
00030     int m_set;
00031 public:
00037     Selection( const char *entries );
00043     template<typename T> Selection( const std::map<T, std::string> &map );
00045     Selection();
00052     bool set( const char *entry );
00058     operator const int()const;
00063     operator const std::string()const;
00068     operator const util::istring()const;
00073     bool operator==( const Selection &ref )const;
00078     bool operator==( const char ref[] )const;
00083     bool operator==( const int ref )const;
00085     std::list<util::istring> getEntries()const;
00086 };
00087 
00088 template<typename T> Selection::Selection( const std::map< T, std::string >& map ): m_set( 0 )
00089 {
00090     for( typename std::map< T, std::string >::const_iterator i = map.begin(); i != map.end(); i++ ) {
00091         const MapType::value_type pair(
00092             util::istring( i->second.begin(), i->second.end() ),
00093             i->first
00094         );
00095         assert( pair.second != 0 ); // 0 is reserved for <<NOT_SET>>
00096 
00097         if( !ent_map.insert( pair ).second ) {
00098             LOG( Debug, error ) << "Entry " << util::MSubject( pair ) << " could not be inserted";
00099         }
00100     }
00101 }
00102 
00103 }
00104 }

00106 namespace std
00107 {
00109 template<typename charT, typename traits>
00110 basic_ostream<charT, traits> &operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out, const isis::util::Selection &s )
00111 {
00112     return out << ( std::string )s;
00113 }
